docs.lead_paragraph: The mingled bafflement, chagrin, and delight which the first London audience felt as Mr. Barrie propounded and solved his three-act satirical riddle was felt by few of those present at the Empire last night, for they had heard the answer before the question, and by noon to-day the wherefore of the wheeze, the secret of the hoax, will be known to all the knowing.

headline.main: HOW "LITTLE MARY" IS; Barrie's Patent Play to Aid Digestion. Satire That Barrieites Will Relish Hugely, but Caviar to the General -- Henry Dixey and Jessie Busley Please.
